/* PizzaEdgeMapper.getSearchPizzaList */ SELECT A.PROD_CD , A.PROD_NM , B.SDSEL_GRP_CD , B.SDSEL_GRP_NM , C.SDSEL_CLASS_CD , C.SDSEL_CLASS_NM , D.PROD_CD AS SDSEL_PROD_CD , E.PROD_NM AS SDSEL_PROD_NM , B.SDSEL_GRP_NM || ' > ' || C.SDSEL_CLASS_NM AS SIDE_INFO , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_HQ_SDSEL_PROD_MAPPING F WHERE F.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND F.SDSEL_CLASS_CD = C.SDSEL_CLASS_CD AND F.PROD_CD = D.PROD_CD ) AS REG_CNT FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT A , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_GROUP B , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_CLASS C , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_PROD D , TB_HQ_PRODUCT E WHERE A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND B.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND B.SDSEL_GRP_CD = A.SDSEL_GRP_CD AND C.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND C.SDSEL_GRP_CD = B.SDSEL_GRP_CD AND D.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND D.SDSEL_CLASS_CD = C.SDSEL_CLASS_CD AND E.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND E.PROD_CD = D.PROD_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.SIDE_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND NVL(C.POP_UP_CLASS_YN,'N') = 'Y' AND NVL(B.HALF_AND_HALF_YN,'N') = 'Y'
AND A.PROD_CD LIKE '%'|| #{prodCd} ||'%'
AND A.PROD_NM LIKE '%'|| #{prodNm} ||'%'
AND D.PROD_CD LIKE '%'|| #{sdselProdCd} ||'%'
AND E.PROD_NM LIKE '%'|| #{sdselProdNm} ||'%'

/* PizzaEdgeMapper.getSearchPizzaMappList */ SELECT D.SDSEL_GRP_CD , D.SDSEL_GRP_NM , A.MAPPING_SDSEL_CLASS_CD , B.SDSEL_CLASS_NM AS MAPPING_SDSEL_CLASS_NM , A.MAPPING_PROD_CD , C.PROD_NM AS MAPPING_PROD_NM , D.SDSEL_GRP_NM || ' > ' || B.SDSEL_CLASS_NM AS SIDE_INFO FROM TB_HQ_SDSEL_PROD_MAPPING A , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_CLASS B , TB_HQ_PRODUCT C , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_GROUP D WHERE A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND B.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD = A.MAPPING_SDSEL_CLASS_CD AND C.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND D.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND D.SDSEL_GRP_CD = B.SDSEL_GRP_CD AND C.PROD_CD = A.MAPPING_PROD_CD AND A.SDSEL_CLASS_CD = #{sdselClassCd} AND A.PROD_CD = #{sdselProdCd}

/* PizzaEdgeMapper.getSearchNoRegProdList */ SELECT A.PROD_CD , A.PROD_NM , B.SDSEL_GRP_CD , B.SDSEL_GRP_NM , C.SDSEL_CLASS_CD , C.SDSEL_CLASS_NM , D.PROD_CD AS SDSEL_PROD_CD , E.PROD_NM AS SDSEL_PROD_NM , B.SDSEL_GRP_NM || ' > ' || C.SDSEL_CLASS_NM AS SIDE_INFO FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT A , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_GROUP B , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_CLASS C , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_PROD D , TB_HQ_PRODUCT E WHERE A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND B.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND B.SDSEL_GRP_CD = A.SDSEL_GRP_CD AND C.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND C.SDSEL_GRP_CD = B.SDSEL_GRP_CD AND D.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND D.SDSEL_CLASS_CD = C.SDSEL_CLASS_CD AND E.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND E.PROD_CD = D.PROD_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.PROD_CD = #{prodCd}z AND NVL(C.POP_UP_CLASS_YN,'N') = 'E' AND D.PROD_CD || C.SDSEL_CLASS_CD NOT IN ( SELECT MAPPING_PROD_CD || MAPPING_SDSEL_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_SDSEL_PROD_MAPPING WHERE SDSEL_CLASS_CD = #{sdselClassCd} AND PROD_CD = #{sdselProdCd} )
